name: My Demons
description:
You can't defeat you inner demons alone...
A short story about love and sorrow

----------------------------------------------------------------

Made by a solo dev for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, theme "Stronger Together"

Controls explained in game.

If you come across a very difficult level (48 enemies??) pull through, it is the last one. If you manage to initially survive and kill 10-15 of them (focus shooters first) it becomes much easier.

For those don't not have the time to finish the game, I put the whole poem in a screenshot so you can read it anyway :)

----------------------------------------------------------------

If you cannot finish the level (enemies decide to ram eachother into oblivion instead of following you) you can press K to restart level or ESC to return to main menu (progress will be saved).

If you prefer playing in browser, then the WebGL buid is uploaded to my profile as a separate game (it's just missing one audio file that was corrupting the build, hence why I couldn't upload it here on time)
https://filtrax.itch.io/mydemons

---------------------------------------------------------------

Thie amazing piano piece featured in the game is "Lonesome Journey" by Keys of Moon.

Check him out: https://soundcloud.com/keysofmoon
